collectible.title: Cupcake
collectible.text:
It's not like she made it for you, baka. But it's really fluffy and tasty, with some subtle notes of chocolate underneath the fine mesh of the confection. The cream is soft and adds density to every bite.
The design was clearly prepared with affection.
